name: Cars Out (Working Version)
description: This game is meant to be for GMTK game jam! The them is "Out Of Control" and I had a not so good idea of Robot cars getting out of control and destroying everything ;-; It is also really bad. The lightning is terrible, but I am really proud of it as it is my first ever game jam. In the 2 days of the game jam I did more than I did in the whole process of learning so I would recommend getting into game jams if you want to learn. Also it would mean a lot to me if you would leave some feedback. There will be a video on how I made making the game in a few days and It will be quite a good quality video :) My channel - GramOner
